pullrequest.title: Issue#96 Add Thrust Angle and Rotation Joint

content.raw:
I tested leaving the engine link stationary and rotating the propelling link around, but it did not look very good. 

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/3002633930-Moving_propeller_Joint.png)
The issue is because the cylinder part is part of the engine.dae file, not the propeller, as shown below. This could be resolved by removing the cylinder from the engine.dae file and making it a new .dae file that better aligns with the propeller as it moves around, but I do not think it is worth doing. 

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/162865701-Engine_Joint.png)
